front.title: Presence and Instant Messaging Protocol (PRIM)Server-Server Protocol Specification

abstract.t: The architecture and specifications of the Presence and Instant Messaging protocols (PRIM) are described. PRIM defines a set of protocols for the Presence and Instant Messaging services which satisfy the IMPP requirements [RFC2779]. PRIM is also designed so as to conform with the Common Profile for Instant Messaging (CPIM) specification being developed in the IMPP WG. This memo describes the PRIM Server-Server protocol specification.
